Text:
how retarded is fuck?

note: this book has also been published under the authors' real names: Wayne Jacobsen and Dave Coleman, who are somehow associated with William Paul Young, the guy who wrote The Shack. FWIW.
Pity the uploader didn't have the courage of his own convictions to use a name, just anonymous.
@triggerjerk--it is just a choice, bunky. No law says you have to have a handle. And when they do a rollcall, do you respond to "jerk,comma,trigger?"
Personally, if I met one of the original disciples, I would expect the story he would have to tell would be way different than what is recorded in the four accepted gospels...
